title: Evelynn tips
body:
So I wanna get into Ev, being trying for a while now but just can't seem to learn how to play her so I'm looking for someone to teach me how to play her LIKE A BAWS.

I have a roughish idea what I'm meant to build, and that's all I really got. 

I'd go over guides but I just can not learn champs that way. 

Any help would be.......helpful :D

replies.body: There's an [Eve onetrick that regularly streams](https://www.twitch.tv/sunsetwastaken) and offers a lot of advice on her. Not sure if you learn through this kind of method, but maybe its worth a check?

> [{quoted}](name=Ingénue,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Tc113R29,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-30T03:36:42.810+0000)
>
> There's an [Eve onetrick that regularly streams](https://www.twitch.tv/sunsetwastaken) and offers a lot of advice on her. Not sure if you learn through this kind of method, but maybe its worth a check?

Furthermore on that note if you search "eve or evelyn" in twitch you should get a streamer or two to interact with and then you can ask them questions and talk to them directly, or on youtube you might get guides or vids. If not I can also suggest going to op.gg, search for "evelyn", look up the current top players and then in the "pro matches" drop down see if you can match up pro eve games with top rated eve players!

Good luck!

Ima try both of these, hopefully make progress.

best way i learn though is through communication while playing. 
learned how to Warwick that way after so  many games of trial and error (which was mostly error so error and error maybe?)

Many people learn much better by just doing the thing with feedback. If that sounds like you (certainly sounds like me), it might be worth trying to find a willing higher or similarly ranked player who plays Evelynn (or even just squishy assassin junglers), and simply play with them or have them spectate.

Personally, while I find tips here and there that help, most of my learning comes from in the moment assessment and correction, and simple trial and error.

Try watching some KingStix. He is a really good evelynn player and he uploads videos on youtube regularly. Otherwise, make sure you are taking the right runes (ignite, sudden impact, celerity, waterwalking) and builds. Good luck.
